item.title: Bin overflowing, house hold rubbish again put by the bin., 27th July
item.description:
House hold rubbish being put by this bin has been, and is a constant problem. The council rectifying the problem quickly is great but it does not seen to deter the person or persons doing this. The bag of household rubbish was torn apart last night by either foxes or rats. I would suggest a camera or at least stickers saying there are cameras would help alleviate the problem
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heathfield Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on cycle rack, 27th July
item.description:
Graffiti identified 2.30pm 27th July on the cycle rack outside our private block of flats. The cycle rack has only been in place a few weeks. The residents objected to its placement as we have garages as do most of the surrounding properties. No one is using it. The objection was not heeded as we were told it would not attract anti social behaviour. It already has and the graffiti needs cleaning off by the council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Sydenham Park Road, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement full of drinkers, 27th July
item.description:
Had to walk twice in the road to get around this and other bars' customers and other obstructions in the immediate vicinity because there's no pavement left because it's full of smokers and drinkers. This is a major thoroughfare.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic speed limit 50mph, 27th July
item.description:
Last night there were needless speed limit warnings for 50mph between J28 and j23. No roadworks, no accidents, no bad weather, no speed calibration testing. What is going on with the M25? To make matters worse J29-J28 towards Watford was closed unexpectedly and resulted in caos and traffic through country roads as no proper signage or diversions were in place.
Report on FixMyStreet
